code: import React from"react";import{Modal,Button}from"react-bootstrap";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const ProjectDetailsModal=_ref=>{let{projectDetails,setIsOpen}=_ref;if(!projectDetails)return null;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Modal,{show:true,onHide:()=>setIsOpen(false),centered:true,size:"lg",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Modal.Header,{closeButton:true,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Modal.Title,{children:projectDetails.title})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Modal.Body,{children:projectDetails.type==="video"?/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("video",{width:"100%",controls:true,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("source",{src:projectDetails.videoSrc,type:"video/mp4"}),"Your browser does not support the video tag."]}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:projectDetails.description})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Modal.Footer,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{variant:"secondary",onClick:()=>setIsOpen(false),children:"Close"})})]});};export default ProjectDetailsModal;
